alert.note: Alert for Camden (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 11:42PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Hunterdon, Camden, Mercer, northern Burlington, southeastern Montgomery, southeastern Bucks and Philadelphia Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Philadelphia to near Hammonton, New Jersey. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Trenton, Camden, Gloucester City, Cherry Hill, Bensalem, Evesham, Mount Laurel, Ewing, Willingboro, Voorhees, Medford, Lindenwold, Lumberton, Princeton, Florence, Bellmawr, Yeadon, Burlington and Bristol. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 3 and 8. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 332 and 359. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 22. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 14 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 331 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 16 and 20. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 26 and 76. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 15 and 19. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 31 and 42, and near mile marker 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
